Title: Silverlight Web Parts for SharePoint
Description: This project will provide a set of integrated Silverlight web parts that can be activated as "Features" on SharePoint 2007 (WSS, MOSS).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project will provide a set of integrated Silverlight web parts that can be activated as "Features" on SharePoint 2007 (WSS, MOSS).



**Silverlight Web Parts for SharePoint **

This project will provide a series of sample projects on using Silverlight with SharePoint.
Initial release of source code and samples will follow soon.
